results.name: Triangle read by rows, taken from the lower triangular matrix (M * A000012 + A000012 * M) - A000012; where M = lower triangular matrix with (1,1,1,...) in the main diagonal and the triangular numbers in the subdiagonal and A000012 = (1; 1,1; 1,1,1;...).
